
# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [1.0.0] - 2024-01-XX

### Added
- Initial production release
- Flask agent implementation with decorator-based task registration
- FastAPI agent implementation with async support
- BaseAgent abstract class for custom implementations
- Multi-tenant support with org_id isolation
- API key authentication
- AbetworksClient for platform integration
- Standard AgentResponse model
- Comprehensive examples for Flask and FastAPI
- Full documentation and developer guide

### Features
- **Flask Support**: Simple decorator-based task registration
- **FastAPI Support**: Modern async/await patterns
- **Type Safety**: Pydantic models for validation
- **Multi-tenant**: Built-in organization isolation
- **Security**: API key authentication and validation
- **Extensible**: Easy to create custom agent implementations

### Documentation
- Complete README with quickstart examples
- Developer guide with best practices
- Example agents for common use cases
- API reference documentation
